author: geirm
msg: Note that this belongs in src/java/org/apache/velocity/util

author: geirm
msg: Test and compare for lowercase introspection flailing with #set()

author: geirm
msg: Added support for using lower-case property identifiers in #set() to match the
ability to get values that way.
will try to call setbar("hi") and then setBar("hi")

author: geirm
msg: Added intropsection test, for upcasing the first letter of a property which fails the default introspection attempt.

author: geirm
msg: Added a small fix to [supposedly] be more beanlike in our introspection, capitalizing the
first letter of the property when looking for a get<property> method the second time,
Now, since I love symmetry, I did the inverse as well, lowercasing the first letter of
the property the second time if it was uppercase the first time.
I really don't like this much :)
